headline: Altria's Q4 Earnings on the Deck: How to Play the Stock
summary: MO's fourth-quarter results are likely to reflect pricing strength and cost discipline, offsetting ongoing cigarette volume pressure.

headline: Assessing Philip Morris International (PM) Valuation After Strong Recent Share Price Gains
summary: Recent Share Performance and Business Snapshot Philip Morris International (PM) has drawn investor attention after a period of strong share performance, with returns of 11% over the past month and 22% over the past 3 months. The company reports annual revenue of US$39.99b and net income of US$8.60b, reflecting its global tobacco operations across cigarettes, smoke free products like IQOS and ZYN, as well as a presence in wellness and healthcare offerings.
